Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.2
Messages: Add cell discovery date to CSV export and JSON broadcast.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.1
Messages: Try to fix exception when button cancelling export or upload.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.0
Messages: Change Uploader to show progress in dialog and notification to unify behavior with Export function.
Remove unnecessary prompt to select storage when disabling file logging.
Fixes related to data collection with NetMonster API.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.13.0
Messages: Distinguish newly discovered from old cells on the map.
Add Korean translation. Thank you zipi!

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.12.0
Messages: Improve support for 5G networks by utilizing NetMonster logic.
